mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, password, user_name, cid, phone) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{cid}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select users.user_id as userId, user_name as userName, users.cid, users.phone from users, community, join_community where users.user_id = join_community.user_id and community.community_id = join_community.community_id and community.community_id = #{0}
mapper.delete: delete from join_community where user_id = #{user_id} and community_id = #{community_id}
